A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Sigh....

First of all I want to thank all reviewers! Iv been reading all reviews since I first saw this movie (december/17). It helped me digesting it.

Also I want to say it kinda 'scares' me that iv seen all these negative ratings for months and it still got an audience score of 48%. Like\, really dark stuff\, is disney really paying.....? Hard to believe but its strange the audience score drops 1% after 4 weeks of 1/2 and 1 star ratings. 

I loved all star wars movie before this one\, including the prequels\, but this one is on another level or garbageness man.
Im not going to repeat its flaws. Everybody knows.

For the reviewers saying its so new\, fresh\, unpredictable\, unexpecting :
please gtfo. This movie is a BAD copy from Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi with a ten times less emotional pay off. Its nothing new. 
People who are saying this probably never saw original SW trilogy.

1 star\, because im affraid 1/2 stars don't count.
